overview: Slayer at Cidade do Rock, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on September 22, 2013. Setlist: 1. World Painted Blood / 2. Disciple / 3. War Ensemble / 4. At Dawn They Sleep / 5. Mandatory Suicide / 6. Hallowed Point / 7. Die by the Sword / 8. Dead Skin Mask / 9. Hate Worldwide / 10. Seasons in the Abyss / 11. South of Heaven / 12. Raining Blood / 13. Angel of Death
title: Slayer: Rock in Rio 2013
